website_summaries.verdict: For those following Atkins or keto diet plans, these enrobed meal replacement bars have the proper balance ofprotein, fiber, and carbs to avoid blood glucose spikes.
pros: Low-carb formula, only 1 gram of sugar per bar
Compatible with keto and other low-carb, high-protein diet plans.Encourages ketogenic weight loss
Wide assortment of flavors, including rich chocolate
cons: Product freshness can be an issue
Unusual aftertaste or bland flavor profile reported

customer_reviews.title: Okay for keto-diet people
customer_reviews.text: I like packaged meal bars for the sake of convenience, but until recently wasn't reading the labels closely enough for the hidden carbs e.g. in maltitol or other sugar alcohols in "low-sugar" bars. At least you know what you're getting with Atkins bars, and they don't taste terrible. The Chocolate Peanut Butter is one of the better flavors, although it's not particularly chocolate-y or peanut butter-y. They're big enough that you could have one with a cup of coffee and be sort-of okay until lunchtime. I've been following a mostly-keto plan (although I'm not extremely rigid, because...life) and these seem to fit in as long as I watch my carbs for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Replicant

customer_reviews.title: THESE ATKINS MOCHA ALMOND MEAL BARS WERE DISAPPOINTING...NEITHER FRESH NOR GOOD
customer_reviews.text: We've had the Atkins Mocha Almond Meal Bars before (those purchased locally). However, this shipment from Amazon was not up to par. They were much closer to their expiration date (August 2018) than typical, lacked flavor, and had a distinctive "stale" taste. That could have been the result of excessive exposure to heat in transit or storage, which accelerates deterioration of boxed food products. These were also *very* tough to bite and chew, much more than those we previously purchased (or the many other Atkins bar flavors we've tried). Definitely not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ENGINEER 10388

customer_reviews.title: Great when you're rushed
customer_reviews.text: I try not to eat these. I'm diabetic, and these are a bit of a cheat, but when there's no time for a meal these are great. They curb my appetite, are low enough in carbs to be ok with my glucose levels, and are tasty. Everything about them works for me except I try to eat naturally when possible. I keep one in my meds bag for emergencies, and it's good to know whatever happens I have a meal on hand that won't spike my levels.
customer_reviews.author: speedknob

customer_reviews.title: I eat one for breakfast every morning with my coffe
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I eat these every morning for breakfast, glad I can order on Amazon now! My 14 year old daughter has been eating them as well for breakfast so I like this value pack. The bars taste real good, I've tried other flavors & this has been my favorite. They are filling and goes well with my morning coffee. Keeps me full until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Shine77

customer_reviews.title: Good, But All Bars Were Melted
customer_reviews.text: Bars are delicious, but are melted as in the picture. I was there when they were delivered, so it’s not like they were sitting out in the sun in front of my house. I guess it’s not a good idea to get these delivered.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: A diabetic, chocoholic's dream come true
customer_reviews.text: At 200 calories and 18 cards, the Atkins bar is the best snack/meal substitute I've found. I'm on a very low-carb diet and have spent hours...days...weeks scanning the grocery displays for just this kinds of product. Either they're too high in cards or calories, are so small that eating just one is useless, or they taste terrible. This bar isn't great tasting, but it tastes good. I've met a few fellow diabetics and have been surprised that they all rave about this product too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Schannon

customer_reviews.title: Something's Different
customer_reviews.text: I used to like this bar but something has changed. It tastes okay. It used to be my very fave flavor from Atkins. They were very fresh so that is not the problem. Can't put my finger on it but not loving them. Also, I bought this box specifically because it was supposedly a "value pack", but per bar I realized it was more expensive than a regular box of 5-count in another flavor I prefer anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Reason

customer_reviews.title: They're Pretty Fing good for a Protien Bar
customer_reviews.text: I bought a box of these on sale at Tar get and thought they were OK for a substitute candy, kill your hunger, low cal diet bar, so I purchased a couple boxes through Amazon. The first ones I bought must have been old because the ones I bought on Amazon are pretty darn good. I find them a good hunger crave killer that carries me several hours, and believe me thats saying alot from a guy that likes food. Buy a box and try them out, I bet you will be surprised at how good they taste.
customer_reviews.author: spork

customer_reviews.title: Delisious with a price
customer_reviews.text: These Adkins bars are truly delisious. If your a chocolate lover like me, be careful. You can't eat just one which you will find poses a huge ...diarrhea. Alcohol sugar does that. I assume that is why you don't gain weight. I have tried several flavors and they are all equally yummy. Just prepare to stay home after you endulge.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate peanut butter bar. Mine arrived in perfect condition. Much cheaper on amazon than my local store. I do not usually use them as a whole meal replacement. I eat them if I am wanting something different than the usual low carb snack, Or if I am craving something sweet n chocolate. I love it with a cup of coffee. I carry them in my purse. Having one with me keeps me from giving in to high carb foods if I am grocery shopping or somewhere where I need a snack. They keep my blood sugar level until I can get to my real food meal.
customer_reviews.author: The Warren’s

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: These have such a good flavor and keep you full for hours. I normally eat eggs and bacon every morning, but every once and a while I like not having to cook in the morning and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lory

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a giant Reese's ... OMG!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are dangerously delicious... they are like expensive and healthy candy bars! They hold up great in your purse or lunch box. I buy them all the time at my local stores, and they have never melted on my way home... BUT they were a gooey mushy mess inside the wrapper when my order was delivered. However, true to their top quality customer service, Amazon was quick to refund my money. NOTE: I think the order must have been left in a very hot car during the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: EMM

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of noxious fumes!
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars fast pretty good, and they're filling, BUT (and this is a huge but) they have me gas, causing me to emit farts so putrid that they made me and everyone in my house nauseous. I don't even have words to describe how bad it was. I'll tell you this, though: I'd rather be locked in a windowless room with a skunk than go through another night after eating 2 Atkins bars.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: I Love These
customer_reviews.text: De - Lish - Us!!!! Love the crunch and the chocolaty goodness of this Atkins bar. Not bad for something that isn’t full of carbs, calories or sugar.
customer_reviews.author: MzCat

customer_reviews.title: keto approved
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help my boyfriend adjust to a keto diet. They are crazy delicious and keto safe if you are just starting out and need a snack while adjusting to the lifestyle. Great for throwing in your bag for a snack at school or work. They do fill you up quite well and I use them during intermittent fasting on days where I only eat one major meal a day.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl-Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: BARS GREAT, PRICE NOT GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I eat one for breakfast every day with coffee and a shake. I purchased 11 times so far. The reason I only gave 3 stars is because I'm getting very annoyed. The first time I purchased these bars on Amazon was a good deal at $35. The price keeps going up. Now it's up to $48 which is NOT A GOOD DEAL anymore. I may switch to something else. I'm a frugal shopper who is NOT VERY HAPPY with the constantly rising price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Daze

customer_reviews.title: These tasted awful!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many different bars/treats from this brand, and they were all really good! But these tasted like stale soy based granola bars. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Sassa

customer_reviews.title: Love Bar; But Always Stale From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor of Atkins bar and first discovered them at Walmart. I love the pretzel crunch combined with the chocolate, peanut butter flavor. I've turned several of my friends on to this particular flavor and they love it as well as a meal replacement or snack. My only issue is the quality of these bars on Amazon. I found them to be a bit cheaper on Amazon. I've now ordered 4 boxes of these bars on 3 separate occasions with Amazon being the seller and unfortunately, each box has been stale every time I've ordered them. I will not be re-ordering them from Amazon. So
customer_reviews.author: Marsline H

customer_reviews.title: Above average, tasty bar to take off the edge.
customer_reviews.text: As with most Atkins bars, they are overpriced and not the best value... Yet still provide the best quality low carb “sweet snacks“, to take off the edge while dieting. Not their best, but still a good solid choice as a snack or meal replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Stewardship

customer_reviews.title: Crisp texture, salty-sweet flavor
customer_reviews.text: We have been eating low carb for a couple of years, and I buy these bars weekly. They have a great crisp texture with the pretzel, and are salty sweet with just enough chocolate to be totally satisfying. They also add to your protein total for the day, which is awesome. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love these, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars. I’ve tried many types and none have tasted as good as these do for the amount of protein you’re getting. I was so tired of having to down a bar just for the protein but these taste like a treat rather than a protein bar. I eat one a day at work and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't taste as good as a high carb protien bar and I'm not the happiest that it uses Sucralose as a sweetener but the bars don't taste bad at all and moderately filling. Doesn't send you racing to the bathroom. Doing Keto and have been monitoring blood ketones and sugar level. This hasn't negatively impacted my ketone levels or caused blood sugar spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase these bars from our local grocery store but lately they have been sold out, so Amazon is my new place to purchase. These bars are filling, taste great, and don't leave an unpleasant after taste like so many other bars and there a great value
customer_reviews.author: DENISE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: I forgot...it Tastes good, too!
customer_reviews.text: Did I say Adkins probably sells just because of the branding? Yep. That was me, I’m afraid. Now I can’t name a favorite. Sugar, salt and protein content are the most important to me. I eat about 5 a week on an average. It fits in perfectly with my protein regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Krybaby1

customer_reviews.title: Best keto snack
customer_reviews.text: My favorite keto snack! These taste amazing!!! And have no funny aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry Bars are
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these Blueberry Bars on Amazon once just for S&G and just love them. Unable to find them locally, Amazon is my source. Good for either a meal replacement or the few times I'm in need of a treat.
customer_reviews.author: From NJ

customer_reviews.title: Keto Snack
customer_reviews.text: These are highly addicting. Glycerin will make your body retain water and cause minor bloating, but they allow me to satisfy a sweet tooth while remaining ketogenic (given you eat these in moderation).
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to get ready for summer. I’ve been back on Aitken’s for a few weeks. I’m down 15lbs already. This flavor and the chocolate peanut butter bars are my favs. I usually have 3 Aitken’s bars or shakes per day. At night High protein/low carb dinner. These are a few cents cheaper than at Walmart for 8 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Baebeeblu

customer_reviews.title: Awful Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Nothing close to chocolate chip cookie dough. I tossed my order because it was nonreturnable. I was surprised as Atkinson's products have usually tasted pretty good to me -- this one a real exception!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Check for tampering!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and dietary aspects of the bars and my only complaint is that the Blueberry Greek Yogurt ones I just got were light one bar. The box of 5 was re-closed with a bar-code stamp and should have alerted me. Upon opening the re-glued box, I discovered only 4 bars. The Amazon representative I immediately phoned was very understanding and helpful, pledging to send a complementary FULL box of 5 gratis. Dann Whalen
customer_reviews.author: Dann Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Away too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Why something on the healthier side needs to be so sweet. Can it be a brand that makes snacks for people that want something just a little sweet? Even though it has low sugar compared to other things, its awayyyyy too sweet. Not my cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: "LuLu"

customer_reviews.title: Best Bar Atkins makes by far!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite Atkins bars. I lost 30lbs 15 years ago on Atkins and now I am back on it! These have just enough sweet and chocolate to satisfy those cravings. The only draw back is that in mild heat, they begin to melt! Keep them cool or freeze them when you plan to pack them to go!
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Atkin Bars Are Great Unless They Are Left In the Heat.....
customer_reviews.text: I got several boxes of Atkin Bars at work. The bars on this box of Chocolate Chip Granola bars were left out in the heat at some point and melted a bit. Otherwise they would be at least a 4 star review but as is, on the 2nd bar, they are less than average.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I used to eat this flavor when they were just plain Slim Fast bars, before they became Atkins. I LOVED them! But somehow they changed, and I mean DRASTICALLY. These are AWFUL! I bought 4 different flavors and the Cookie Dough was the WORST! I'm so disappointed that they changed them so much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Can't order online. They were all melted when they arrived. I should have thought of that before I ordered. Won't order online any time soon. Mississippi in summer too hot!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela W.  Melton

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for a few months now, they are my go to morning treat. This keeps me away from other sugar filled snacks and I will continue to purchase. Every little bit helps - these are win -win for me! Super creamy - so much better than other bars I've purchased at higher prices.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar out there
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many, many different protein bars and this is, by far, the best one I've come across. It is filling, sweet (but not sickly sweet) and tastes good. Fast shipping, as well. Much more convenient than even going to the store in person to pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: husband likes them
customer_reviews.text: my husband doesn't like any of these kinds of bars, except the atkins ones! He likes the flavors. I think they are a bit overpriced. But it's the only ones he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Jb h

customer_reviews.title: So good they're almost addictive!
customer_reviews.text: These chocolate peanut butter bars have an incredible taste! So yummy! And, so filling too! My grandchildren love to have one for breakfast when visiting. These bars easily keep you feeling full until lunchtime! Such a good source of protein!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars and my adult soon does too
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and my adult soon does too. They satisfy better than the other meal replacement bars we have tried. I purchase these every Month from Amazon on auto ship. love the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement or meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Actual protein bars never taste good, this isn't really a "protein" bar, but has a lot of protein and low net carbs, which is perfect for cutting calories, or for a low carb snack. This and the peanut butter pretzel taste great, although this one has more fat than would be ideal for 250 calories.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Very dense but really satisfying,
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. They taste a bit like a protein bar but still good and I love how satisfying they are. I feel like I had sweet-tooth satisfied. They are pretty dense calorie-wise however.
customer_reviews.author: DanNyc

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, but don't trust the Net Carbs claim
customer_reviews.text: Great product, delicious, but don't believe Atkins hype of such low Net Carbs, these send a lot of people out of the desired fat-burning ketosis (at least true from what ive been reading), like me. so great taste, low calorie, sort of low carb. if you are just going for 50-100 net carbs a day to maintain weight then fine, but if you are trying to hit 20 to 50 net carbs and burn fat, avoid these... unless desperate for sweets, but a diet coke would be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Arizona Heat
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these bars over the last 6 months and have been very pleased until now with delivery. My bars were delivered completely melted and unusable. They should be handled differently in this heat. I normally don’t complain but now the bars I count on for my diet are unusable. Please consider how long the bars are exposed to our temperatures. I know it’s rough times for all right now especially due to the increase in online orders. Thank you, Susanne Edenfield
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great instead of breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I really don't eat breakfast anymore, but I do need the protein and the fiber. These really fit the bill. They taste great and are low carb.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Protein taste
customer_reviews.text: Not to my taste. Peanut butter tastes like the protein fake kind. Was hoping for a more true Peanut butter taste. Also gives me very bad gas.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Expensive nasty tasting fake food. I thought it would help as a low carb snack but they were inedible.wish they had a guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: MJ VanHecker

customer_reviews.title: These are good keto bars when in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: These Atkins bars are great tasting and if I haven't prepared enough food for my daily meal plan, I'll have one of these. Very satisfying and filling.
customer_reviews.author: ruthieo54

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. They're 200 calories/bar which is higher than most granola bars, and I usually eat half a time as a snack I can feel good about.
customer_reviews.author: a reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged, making it it hard to eat and get out of the wrapper
customer_reviews.author: Emily in Keto

customer_reviews.title: One of the tastiest Adkins bars available
customer_reviews.text: Purchased through Amazon's Subscribe & Save program these bars ended up costing about $1.48 each. I had been purchasing the Atkins at my local Walmart for less but when they ran out I found this to be the best available deal for what I consider to be Atkins' best tasting bars except for their nutty fudge brownie (which I also subscribe to)but they weigh a lot less per bar, only 1.4oz versus the for 2.1oz for the Chocolate Cookie Dough bar. The cookie dough mixed with chocolate taste is quite distinctive, the texture is smooth and each bite practically melts in your mouth!
customer_reviews.author: nvlystd

customer_reviews.title: Best meal bars out there hands-down
customer_reviews.text: These are the best meal bars out there out of all the different ones I’ve tried which were a lot these tastes the best they’re amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sara k. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with these protein bars. They're addictive! Lol so good, a little crunchy and not too chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Be careful on hot delivery days!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a hot day, on all 24 bars, the chocolate coating was melted upon delivery! Still editable but very crumbly and messy...
customer_reviews.author: davebehee

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but shipping is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy in the summer. They arrived melted. We bought some gummy vitamins and they were in a ball due to the heat.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY L. D'ATTOMO

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! I wanted to cut as many carbs and refined sugars from my (not always great) diet and figured these would be mediocre at best. They’re actually very good and I look forward to having one as opposed to it feeling like a big compromise. I definitely recommend buying these if you’re reducing sugar intake
customer_reviews.author: GDP

customer_reviews.title: Caused me digestion issues
customer_reviews.text: It tastes a lot better than other protein bars but ever since I have been eating it, i noticed stomach issues. It makes me feel bloated. I stopped taking these now.0
customer_reviews.author: Zeena

customer_reviews.title: Too Salty
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate, peanut butter, and pretzel. I even love them all together. But these bars were not that great. Didn’t taste much chocolate, just really salty peanut butter with some crunchiness from the pretzels.
customer_reviews.author: EKS

customer_reviews.title: Yum 3
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I ever quit this lifestyle, and being able to get them through Amazon Prime is the low carb frosting on the cake! Only thing missing is the $1 off coupon in the inside of the box. Great variety of flavors and always delicious.
customer_reviews.author: econwell323

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I fighting sugar so these bars are low in sugar. Has good taste. I've been buying Atkins products for years.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgannDuckett

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great!
customer_reviews.text: This are great for you and low in sugar for Diabetics. Great snack for those always on the run!
customer_reviews.author: M. Faris

customer_reviews.title: Great product delivered stale
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in September and recently reordered. The bars in the last delivery of three boxes were stale, dry and many were broken. The boxes themselves were in distressed condition. Perhaps I should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: john maino

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!!
customer_reviews.text: It's not my favorite in the line of Atkins bars, but it is very good. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Pick

customer_reviews.title: Expired Products
customer_reviews.text: One of three boxes was old and expired. I didn't check until I ate one and it was terrible. It tasted disgusting. I've eaten these for breakfast for years. I have never had one taste bad. Very disappointing. I am a little afraid to try any more of them but at least the other two boxes are not as old and expired.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Get the waffle vanilla instead!
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the worst tasting bars ever. Too bad I couldn’t return them after opening the box. I’ve been forcing myself to eat them since I’ve already spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Djummy & Mensie

customer_reviews.title: My husband enjoys these for breakfast! He recommends them
customer_reviews.text: My husband eats one most mornings as his keto breakfast. I don’t care for them, but he does. Reorderd frequently. Try them
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Artificial Sweetener in product proven to cause cancer.
customer_reviews.text: it contains an Artificial sweetener which is known to cause Cancer. Yet their advertisement claims that all ingredients are all natural with no Artificial Ingredients......Hum!
customer_reviews.author: D&E Jones

customer_reviews.title: good snack bar, bad price.
customer_reviews.text: price has jumped greatly since i started buying these, i was getting the box of 12 for 15 bucks, now its almost that much for a box of five. i dont understand and i will probably stop buying unless prices go back to being reasonable. overall they taste was good, no complaints in that regard and the shipping speed was fast. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Keil F. Nitz

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is great, blueberry and yogurt all the way. One of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Tastes ok
customer_reviews.text: Tastes ok. Not a Snicker's Bar, but for a low carb keto bar, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but they don’t ship to AZ in the summer (understandable). :(.....
customer_reviews.author: Diane J.

customer_reviews.title: I keep getting more
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about trying Atkins, the key is to find things you like to eat. For me, this is one of those things. The bars are filling and a bit heavy. Definitely chewier than actual cookie dough, but still good. Keep them out of the heat. This, like all the chocolate bars, is not a good one to have in your car or purse on a warm day. I've been doing Atkins for a year and I've lost 8" off my waist. I bet you can, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Kline

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my least favorite of Atkins. Tasted bland, and almost like dog chow. Yucky.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Very Crunchy, not very good..
customer_reviews.text: Does not taste much like blueberry and yogurt, too much crunch. The description of the bar does not accurately describe what you will receive... Very Disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Tommm.

customer_reviews.title: Meal Replacement Bats
customer_reviews.text: Some of the Atkins bars are one was not chocolate peanut butter ptezels
customer_reviews.author: Bargain lady

customer_reviews.title: Super good - tastes like a Snickers bar!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on keto for a year and find these to be a nice break from my standard Kirkland brand low-carb protein bars. Decent macros for people on the keto (or lazier keto) diet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle_T

customer_reviews.title: Will only order online in winter
customer_reviews.text: I like the bars (5 stars) but they came in as a melted, crumbly mess.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Page

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Abysmal seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been eating these bars for years. Unfortunately, the seller, Genesis, passes the buck when asked why it hasn't been delivered. Buy the product. Avoid the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rubens

customer_reviews.title: These really are satisfying and good taste
customer_reviews.text: I actually could only consume half before I was satisfied. Happy camper really curbs your appetite with taste
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: This bar has really great flavor and plenty of protein. I will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Siedenburg

customer_reviews.title: received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I love the Atkins Chocolate Peanut Butter Pretzel bar, but I received a different flavor, with caramel. Not happy with the substitution.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: High Protein, Low Carb and Satisfying
customer_reviews.text: These are satisfying and the price is competitive. Beware of eating more than one of these in 24h because the malitol that they contain can wreak havoc on your digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brian Lamm

customer_reviews.title: White film on the chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 boxes of Atkins Pretzel Bars and all the bars had a white film on the chocolate. Date said March 2021.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Krauss

customer_reviews.title: ... melted mess but to my surprised it arrived in perfect condition. These bars are great in taste and ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Puerto Rico and was expecting a melted mess but to my surprised it arrived in perfect condition. These bars are great in taste and perfect for when you are in a rush!. It keeps me satisfied for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: mairim

customer_reviews.title: A Satisfying Meal Replacement.
customer_reviews.text: When we are short on time or just want something different, The Atkins meal bars are great. They satisfying and taste pretty darn good too. You keep the carbs down and feel like you’re eating a candy or protein bar. All of the Atkins food choices are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh, these are okay. Not horrible, not great. Melt super easy, so eat quick and preferably not in a warm place. The further along on your diet that you are, the better they taste. Just sayin'.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J

customer_reviews.title: Super delicious.
customer_reviews.text: So delicious. They are great for people on a diet and for people that can't eat meat. I love them. I have one every day.
customer_reviews.author: nicole mcgahey

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! To me It’s the only diet related snack bar that doesn’t taste like garbage. I’ve tried all the other snack bars. Only the ones loaded with sugar tasted decent. The bars with 1 gram of sugar are usually dry and taste stale. These Atkins bars have a better flavor than most like them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard & tasted dry
customer_reviews.text: These were very dry and very hard they may have just been out dated. But even if they were more moist I still don’t think I would’ve like the flavor. There are so many other Atkins bars that taste a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These have a good taste if your on a diet and looking for something that doesn’t taste like cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Won't order again.
customer_reviews.text: The taste of these is not good. Leaves a weird after taste in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Betty McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Need more Atkins meals for LUNCH
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived okay, but the box was crushed as was some of the bars. Atkins meals are hard to find now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bars but a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: I truly do love these, but like all Atkins products here on Amazon these really are not a great deal. you can find them in the store for less.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very filling lasts 4 hrs
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of Atkins meal bars and they keep me from hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: Tasres great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars, but wish they came in higher count pkgs. Filling and tastes great! Still steep but not when 6ou compare to some others.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Sympson

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: They were stale even though the expiration date was good. I have got these before and they were never discolored or stale. Tasted horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben  Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its because I don't like the taste of protein bars but this one only had a bad aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmine

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 64 count purchase. You will get a single box of 8. I thought I had got a good deal but it turns out it's just a lazy/inaccurate product description.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Best “Meal Replacement Bar” I’ve tasted !!!
customer_reviews.text: They are FABULOUS!! Very Filling, taste great, keep you full for hours....will put on “auto delivery” !
customer_reviews.author: Jaye55

customer_reviews.title: Great Meal or Snack Replacement
customer_reviews.text: As above, I use this product for meal replacements or snacks for a quick pick me up!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Madsen

product_meta.title: Atkins Protein-Rich Meal Bar, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Keto Friendly, 5 Count (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Style:Meal Bar| Flavor Name:Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar| Size:5 Count (Pack of 6)Satisfy your chocolate craving while giving your body the nutrients it needs with the Atkins Protein-Rich Meal Bars. With the creamy taste of chocolate chip cookie dough coated in sweet milk chocolate, our meal bars help you power through the day or an intense workout. Each bar has 13 grams of protein, 14 grams of fiber, 1 gram of sugar and 3 grams of net carbs, making them a perfect meal replacement for low carb and keto friendly* lifestyles. Includes six boxes of 5 Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein-Rich Meal Bars. The Atkins Diet and Lifestyle provides quick, effective, and balanced weight loss by limiting carbs and sugar to help the body burn fat for fuel and keep your energy steady. With over 80 published clinical studies to support the principles behind the Atkins Diet, we provide filling and delicious snacks to help you stay on track! *When used with Atkins ketogenic programs
feature_bullets: Six boxes of 5 Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Protein-Rich Meal Bars
Creamy taste of chocolate chip cookie dough all enrobed in sweet milk chocolate
13 grams of high quality protein and 14 grams of fiber per bar
3 grams net carbs and 1 gram of sugar per serving
Keto friendly! *When used with Atkins ketogenic programs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
